thread.title: Michelle Alexander
thread.title_full: US Service Animals reviewed by Michelle Alexander

author: Michelle Alexander
title: Michelle Alexander
text: After talking to a friend, I looked online and reviewed the website. I was a little apprehensive but answered the questions and registered. Within 24 hours I received a called back from Cheryl Speights. She was AWESOME! She explained the best service that I should get for my beloved pet. Cheryl was both very professional and super friendly and answered all my questions. Thanks Cheryl for making this process painless! You rock!!!
